com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenMultiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenMultiView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SpenSettingViewEraserInterface, SpenSettingViewInterface, SpenSettingViewPenInterface

    public class SpenMultiView
extends View
implements SpenSettingViewInterface, SpenSettingViewPenInterface, SpenSettingViewEraserInterface
    This class provides methods for managing Pen multiviews. This class does not support correction pen, marker pen.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.SpenSettingViewPenInterface

        SpenSettingViewPenInterface.SpenBackgroundColorChangeListener

      • PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_TYPE_SHADOW

        public static final int PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_TYPE_SHADOW
        Shadow transition for page. The left image moves in line and the right image changes size.

        3.0.0

      • SpenMultiView

        public SpenMultiView(Context context,
                     AttributeSet attrs,
                     int defStyle)
        Creates an SpenMultiView instance with attributes from the specified XML attributes and the specified class-specific default style. When closed, you must call the close() close() function. If you don't call the close() close() function, memory leak should be occured.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        attrs - The XML attributes.
        defStyle - The default style to apply to this view. Set this to 0 to apply no style beyond what is included in the theme. This can be an attribute resource, which is retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenMultiView(Context), SpenMultiView(Context, AttributeSet)

      • setToolTypeAction

        public void setToolTypeAction(int toolType,
                              int action)
        Set the specified action for the specified tool type. To use this function, you can need to call first to use.
        Specified by:
        setToolTypeAction in interface SpenSettingViewInterface
        Parameters:
        toolType - The tool type. The valid values are SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_UNKNOWN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_FINGER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_SPEN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_MOUSE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_ERASER. For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.
        action - The action for the tool The valid values are SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_NONE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_GESTURE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_STROKE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_ERASER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_COLOR_PICKER. For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - Thrown if UserId is not set before
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPageDoc

        public boolean setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc,
                          boolean isUpdate)
        Set the specified page document instance to the current view.
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The page document instance.
        isUpdate - Set to true to update the screen, set to false to not update the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the page document instance is set. false if the page document instance is not set.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.h
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPageDoc

        public boolean setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc,
                          int direction,
                          int type,
                          float centerY)
        Set the specified page document instance to the current view. If the width is greater than the width of the screen, this method can cause an OutOfMemory exception.
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The PageDoc instance.
        direction - The page transition direction. The valid values are PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_LEFT, PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_RIGHT. For more information, see Field Detail in this class.
        type - type of pageDoc
        centerY - The centerY position to move to after setting the page document.
        Returns:
        true if the page document instance is set. false if the page document instance is not set.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the canvas. Call this method only after an adding an object with fileCacheItem. To change the background to PageDoc after adding or removing an Object, call update () to update the screen View.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • updateUndo

        public void updateUndo(SpenPageDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] userDataList,
                       int userId)
        Undo the last stroke by the specified user. SpenMultiView does not support command history on the existing SpenSurfaceView or SpenView. Only strokes inputted locally or on the network can be undone or redone.
        Parameters:
        userDataList - The action history data list object.
        userId - The user ID.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • updateRedo

        public void updateRedo(SpenPageDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] userDataList,
                       int userId)
        Redo the stroke undone by the specified user. SpenMultiView does not support command history on the existing SpenSurfaceView or SpenView. Only strokes inputted locally or on the network can be undone or redone.
        Parameters:
        userDataList - The action history data list object.
        userId - The user ID.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        listener - The SpenPageEffectListener instance to receive page effect events.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPenChangeListener

        public void setPenChangeListener(SpenPenChangeListener listener)
        Set the specified SpenPenChangeListener instance to receive pen change events.
        Parameters:
        listener - SpenPenChangeListener instance to receive pen change events.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public void setEraserChangeListener(SpenEraserChangeListener listener)
        Set the specified SpenEraserChangeListener instance to receive eraser change events.
        Parameters:

        Since:

      • captureCurrentView

        public Bitmap captureCurrentView(boolean includeBlank)
        Get the bitmap of the current view.
        Parameters:
        includeBlank - Set to true to include a blank in the captured bitmap, set to false to capture the screen without a blank.
        Returns:
        The Bitmap instance of the captured screen. Destroy the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • capturePage

        public Bitmap capturePage(float ratio)
        Get the bitmap of the current page. Ratio must be greater than 0 and below 5. ( 0 < ratio <= 5) Destroy the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Parameters:
        ratio - The ratio to apply to the captured image.
        Returns:
        The Bitmap instance of the captured page. Destroy the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - thrown if not enough memory to create captured bitmap.
        IllegalArgumentException - if create bitmap with size exceeds 32bits with 32bits OS
        NegativeArraySizeException - if create bitmap with size exceeds 32bits with 64bits OS
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • closeControl

        public void closeControl()
        Close the base control.
        Specified by:
        closeControl in interface SpenSettingViewInterface
        Since:
        3.0.0
